description: Replacement cartridge for the Katadyn® Hiker and Hiker Pro water filters.Effective to 0.2 microns, protecting against protozoa and larger bacteria.Removes bacteria, giardia, and cryptosporidia to EPA standards.129 square inches of pleated 0.2 micron glassfiber media.Does not require cleaning.Cartridge capacity is 1150 litres, depending on water quality.
name: Katadyn Hiker Pro Replacement Cartridge
